text: Annotations Zoom In/Out: To enhance your document markup experience, you can now write annotations even after zooming in/out a PDF.
Annotations Auto-Saving: Improved User Experience by displaying notifications to confirm your work is always saved.

Folder Upload Improvement: After a folder has been uploaded, you can now see the previews of PDF and Video files within all folders and sub-folders, making it easier to organize and access your content.
Bug Fixes & Other Improvements: We have addressed browser-specific issues and enhanced the stability of our In-App Viewer, ensuring a smoother and more reliable experience overall.
